marsbars

Class HumidityModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • marsbars.HumidityModel

  • public class HumidityModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Model responsible for calculations that are required for the humidity sensor and humidifier control.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAXHUMIDITY 
      static int MINHUMIDITY

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getCurrentHumidity()
      Returns the current humidity of the environment as picked up by the humidity sensor
      java.lang.String getDeviceStatus()
      Returns whether or not the humidifier has been turned on or off by the sensor system
      void sensor()
      This is the sensor method to check the humidity level of the greenhouse and update the humidity level according to the rate of change that the user has specified.

      Set the current humidity level of the greenhouse

      Sets the user desired upper and lower range of humidity for the sensor to maintain upto

    • Method Detail

      • setHumidityRange

        public void setHumidityRange(double humidUpper,
                             double humidLower)
        Sets the user desired upper and lower range of humidity for the sensor to maintain upto
        Parameters:
        humidUpper - The maximum humidity level of the desired humidity range
        humidLower - The minimum humidity level of the desired humidity range

      • setCurrentHumidity

        public void setCurrentHumidity(double currHumid)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Set the current humidity level of the greenhouse
        Parameters:
        currHumid - Humidity of the greenhouse to set to
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - A custom error that prompts the user if desired humdity is beyond the threshold range.

      • setInternalHumidRate

        public void setInternalHumidRate(double rate)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Set the current rate at which the humidifier raises the humidity of the greenhouse
        Parameters:
        rate - Rate of increase in humidity (%/min)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Prompt the user that humidity rate of change can only be positive because there is no dehumidifier

      • getCurrentHumidity

        public double getCurrentHumidity()
        Returns the current humidity of the environment as picked up by the humidity sensor
        Returns:
        currentHumidity Current greenhouse humidity level

      • getDeviceStatus

        public java.lang.String getDeviceStatus()
        Returns whether or not the humidifier has been turned on or off by the sensor system
        Returns:
        A message to display on the GUI (On/Off)

      • sensor

        public void sensor()
        This is the sensor method to check the humidity level of the greenhouse and update the humidity level according to the rate of change that the user has specified. It also controls the humidifier in order to increase(only) the level of humidity to the desired range specified by the user.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Creates a well formated data string so that it can be stored into a simulation save file for retrieval
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
